why: Anti-inflammatory eating supports healing and reduces pain sensitivity.

slides.title: Anti-Inflammatory Foods
slides.content: Foods rich in omega-3s, antioxidants, and fiber can help reduce inflammation and support tissue healing

slides.title: Foods That Fight Inflammation
slides.content: Leafy greens, berries, fatty fish, nuts, and olive oil are powerful anti-inflammatory foods

slides.title: Foods to Limit
slides.content: Processed foods; refined sugars; trans fats — increase inflammation and slow recovery.

slides.title: Myth vs Fact
slides.content: Myth: All fats are bad. Fact: Omega‑3 fats are anti‑inflammatory and beneficial.

slides.title: Try this today
slides.content: Swap one processed snack for a handful of nuts and berries.
